subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki was listed first on 83 of the 129 ballots to end the two-year M.V.P. reign of his close friend and former teammate Steve Nash of the Phoenix Suns.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki was listed first on 83 of the 129 ballots to end the two-year M.V.P. reign of his close friend and former teammate Steve Nash of the Phoenix Suns.
